name: No Normal Guns
description:
This is a top-down shooter where you can choose four different crazy weapons to fight waves increasing in size. 

Bounce - Deals no damage until it hits a wall, then it bounces off of everything at high speed

Wall Laser - Fires a ball that grows in size over time, then once it hits a wall it releases a laser. It could last a a long time, or be huge depending on how large the ball was before it hit the wall

Magnet - Moves away from the mouse at all times. Moving the mouse closer to the bullets make them go faster and deal more damage. 

Sling - a ball is released, and swings out in a spiral around the player. It grows and size and damage until it hits an enemy or a wall and releases and even larger explosion.
